author: Dom Calicchio
title: Trevor Noah’s Trump-bashing over coronavirus wins him fans – in China
description: His nightly TV ratings in the U.S. lag far behind those of other late-night hosts, but Trevor Noah of “The Daily Show” has been winning lots of new fans – in communist China, according to a report.
content:
